integrations.zoho crm_description: Export your call intake to Zoho CRM
zoho crm_long_description: Ensure that your Zoho CRM campaign reaches the intended target audience with WellReceived. For every new customer created at WellReceived, this integration will automatically add corresponding contact information to your Zoho CRM campaign list.
zoho crm_instruction: Click the ‘Connect’ button on the right-hand side of this window.
Enter your Zoho CRM username and password to allow access to WellReceived.
Confirm the action by clicking Allow. The integration will now be Connected.

integrations.salesforce_description: Import new WellReceived customers to your Salesforce client list.
salesforce_long_description: Automatically create a new contact in Salesforce when a new customer is created in WellReceived. Kickstart your sales and marketing campaigns with the customers who are already booking appointments with your business.
salesforce_instruction: Click the ‘Connect’ button on the right-hand side of this window.
Enter your Salesforce username and password to continue.
You will be prompted to authorize access for WellReceived. Click Authorize to complete the integration.

integrations.open dental_description: With this integration, we are going to create “New Patient Record” from our Call intakes.
integrations.open dental_long_description: Ensure any new patient data is updated directly into your OpenDental account. For every new patient brought into your practice through WellReceived, this integration will automatically create a new patient record in your OpenDental account and database. We will be rolling out updates to this integration to enable more interoperable features with your OpenDental account. Coming soon.
open dental_instruction: Click the ‘Connect’ button on the right-hand side of this window.
Enter your OpenDental username and password to allow access to WellReceived
Confirm the action by clicking Allow. The integration will now be connected.
integrations.to_enable_this: To enable this integration, you must allow WellReceived and <APP NAME> to share details
integrations.you_must_select: You must select a business location to continue integrating your accounts. Please try again.
integrations.to_host_video: To host video appointments using <APP NAME>, you’ll need to switch off the <APP NAME integration>
integrations.to_enable_your: To enable your team to host Google Meet appointments, you’ll need to open individual profiles and switch on ‘Google sync
integrations.connect_a_payment: Connect a payment integration to accept Booking Page payments
integrations.setmore_is_currently: WellReceived is currently syncing your <APP NAME>. Please wait a few moments before de-activating the sync. Thank you for your patience!
integrations.integration_meets_complaince: Before activating, make sure that your use of the integration meets compliance and data security requirements, such as HIPAA, in your area <Terms of Service>.
integrations.third_party_integration: By enabling a 3rd Party Integration service, you hereby agree to assume HIPAA liability for your use of this service and agree to our HIPAA compliant <Terms of Service>.
integrations.only_tagged_pictures: Deleting a hashtag stops your Booking Page from displaying past and future posts that use the hashtag.
integrations.there_is_a_hickup: There’s been a hiccup Something didn’t work quite right. Please try again.
integrations.something_went_wrong_deactivate: Something went wrong, please disconnect and connect again.
integrations.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
integrations.disconect_message: Disconnecting would result in permanent deletion of the workflow. Are you sure you still want to disconnect?
integrations.disconect_message_video_meeting_integrat: New appointments will not have <APP NAME> links attached. <APP NAME> links for previously scheduled appointments will be removed, but the appointments will stay in your calendar.
integrations.disconect_message_social_media_integrati: Your <APP NAME> page will no longer display the ‘Book now’ button that directs people to your Booking Page. To take bookings from  <APP NAME> again, you’ll need to reconnect your accounts.
Your Booking Page’s Photos section will no longer update with new Instagram posts. To stream posts from Instagram again, you’ll need to reconnect your accounts.
integrations.disconect_message_payment_integrations: You’ll no longer be able to process payments through your calendar or Booking Page. However, previous payment data will remain in your accounts.
integrations.disconect_message_payment_integrations_p: You’ll no longer be able to process payments through your Booking page. However, previous payment data will remain in your accounts.
integrations.disconect_message_payment_integrations_c: You’ll no longer be able to process payments through your calendar. However, previous payment data will remain in your accounts.
integrations.disconect_message_sales_and_crm_integrat: Customer details will no longer sync between <BRAND NAME> and <APP NAME>. However, details collected previously will remain in your accounts. To make enabling this integration faster in future, your settings will be retained.
integrations.disconect_message_accounting_integration: Transaction details will no longer sync between <BRAND NAME> and <APP NAME>. However, details collected previously will remain in your accounts. To make enabling this integration faster in future, your settings will be retained.
integrations.disconect_message_calendar_sync_integrat: New event details will no longer sync between your <BRAND NAME> and <APP NAME>. Previously synced events will only appear in the calendar they were created in.
integrations.disconect_message_marketing_integrations: Customer details will no longer sync between <BRAND NAME> and <APP NAME>. However, details collected previously will remain in your accounts. To make enabling this integration faster in future, your settings will be retained.
integrations.disconect_message_business_app_integrati: <APP NAME> will no longer track Booking Page activity, but data recorded previously will remain available in your account.
The Slack channel that receives booking and customer updates from WellReceived will be deleted. To view this channel again, you’ll need to reconnect your accounts.
integrations.maximum_limit_reached: A maximum of 10 emails can be fired out from your account every 30 minutes. Please wait a moment and try again.
integrations.already_integrated: Account already integrated with same ID

mapper.service_alert_all_one: All services in your account will become <APP NAME>|-enabled|. This includes services that are currently <MAIN NAME>-enabled. If you’d like to revert any services back to <main name>, simply head to |Services| |&| |classes|. <Learn more>
mapper.class_alert_all_one: All classes in your account will become <APP NAME>|-enabled|. This includes classes that are currently <MAIN NAME>-enabled. If you’d like to revert any classes back to <main name>, simply head to |Services| |&| |classes|. <Learn more>
mapper.service_alert_all_two: All services in your account will become <APP NAME>|-enabled|. This includes services that are currently <MAIN NAME>-enabled or <MAIN NAME>-enabled. If you’d like to revert any services back to <main name>, simply head to |Services| |&| |classes|. <Learn more>
mapper.class_alert_all_two: All classes in your account will become <APP NAME>|-enabled|. This includes classes that are currently <MAIN NAME>-enabled or <MAIN NAME>-enabled. If you’d like to revert any classes back to <main name>, simply head to |Services| |&| |classes|. <Learn more>
mapper.service_alert_single: This service is currently <MAIN NAME>-enabled. To automatically attach <APP NAME> |links| instead, click ‘Yes, switch’ and save this change. If you’d like to revert this service back to <main name>, simply head to |Services| |&| |classes|.
mapper.class_alert_single: This class is currently <MAIN NAME>-enabled. To automatically attach <APP NAME> |link| instead, click ‘Yes, switch’ and save this change. If you’d like to revert this class back to <main name>, simply head to |Services| |&| |classes|
